Description.Text: Casa Conde Beach Front Hotel is a comfortable 4-star property offering tranquil accommodation in Panama. Highlights include several outdoor swimming pools, a fitness centre and a great beachfront location. Playa Panama is located in northwest Costa Rica and overlooks the Gulf of Papagayo. Regional places of interest include the mountains, jungle and beautiful beaches. The hotel is housed in a series of modern low-rise buildings with traditional Costa Rica architecture. Facilities include several outdoor swimming pools, a fitness centre and Jacuzzi. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard Garden View rooms are approximately 39sqm, spacious and decorated in a traditional style with tiled floors. They feature a large living room and a garden view. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and separate walk-in shower. Abbocato serves regional specialities and international cuisine in a relaxed setting, and guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at Rumba's Beach Club. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
